lists.title: My Lists
lists.emptyDescription: Create your first list to get started!
lists.items: {count, plural, =0 {no items} one {# item} other {# items}}
lists.maxLists: You've reached the 50-list limit. Delete a list to create more.

items.emptyDescription: Add items above or send a voice message
items.partialAdd: Added {added} items. {skipped} items skipped ‚Äî this list has a 500-item limit.

voice.error: Sorry, I couldn't understand that. Please try again or use the app.
voice.rateLimited: You're sending voice messages too quickly. Please wait a moment.
voice.noLists: You don't have any lists yet! Open the app to create your first list.
voice.listNotFound: I couldn't find a list named '{listName}'. Open the app to create it.
voice.noUser: Please open the app first to get started!
voice.tooLong: That voice message is too long. Please keep it under 1 minute.

share.title: Share list

share.waitingDescription: The list owner will review your request.
share.declinedMessage: Your request to join {listName} was declined.

errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to do that.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired ‚Äî please close and reopen the app.

bot.welcome:
